{{multiple issues|{{Notability|Companies|date=January 2011}}|primarysources=January 2011|refimprove=January 2011|self-published=January 2011}} {{Infobox company | company_name = Flax | company_logo = | company_type = [[Private company|Private]] | foundation = 2001 | location = [[Cambridge]], [[UK]] | key_people = Charlie Hull (Founder), Tom Mortimer (Founder) | area_served = [[Europe]]
[[Americas]]
[[Australia]] | industry = [[Information technology]]
[[Open Source Software]]
[[Enterprise Search]] | services = Architecture, development and support for [[Lucene|Apache Lucene]], [[Solr|Apache Solr]], [[Xapian]] | products = | revenue = | operating_income = | net_income = | num_employees = | parent = | subsid = | company_slogan = | homepage = http://www.flax.co.uk/ | footnotes = }} '''Flax''' provides independent open source search solutions based on the [[Xapian]] and [[Lucene]]/[[Solr]] platforms. Flax is based in [[Cambridge]], [[UK]]. ==External links== * [http://www.xapian.org/ Xapian website] * [http://lucene.apache.org/ Apache Lucene website] * [http://twitter.com/flaxsearch Flax on Twitter] [[Category:Companies established in 2001]] [[Category:Software companies of the United Kingdom]] {{UK-company-stub}}
